PHRASE.LANG: kName
Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot's Helmet (female)
Casque de pilote diabolique Scribble Shooter (femme)
"Scribble Shooter"-Helm des bösen Piloten (Damen)
Scribble Shooter - Copricapo Pilota malefico (donna)
Casco de piloto malvada de Scribble Shooter (Mujer)
Scribble Shooter イビルパイロットマスク（女性用）
스크리블 슈터 악의 파일럿 헬멧 (여성)
Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot's Helmet (Women)
Scribble Shooter邪惡飛行員頭盔（女用）
Scribble Shooter邪惡飛行員頭盔（女用）
Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot's Helmet (female)
kDesc
With the mere donning of this helmet, you too may command the powers of the Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot. [#Legal]
Grâce au port de ce casque, vous posséderez vous-aussi les pouvoirs d'une pilote diabolique Scribble Shooter. [#Legal]
Allein durch Tragen dieses Helms erhält man die Mächte des bösen "Scribble Shooter"-Piloten. [#Legal]
Con questo copricapo, ti basterà un cenno per scatenare i poteri del Pilota malefico di Scribble Shooter. [#Legal]
En cuanto te pongas este casco, podrás dominar los poderes de una piloto malvada de Scribble Shooter. [#Legal]
このマスクを着用するだけで、Scribble Shooterのイビルパイロットに大変身！[#Legal]
이 헬멧을 착용하는 것만으로도 이제 당신은 스크리블 슈터 악의 파일럿이 가진 힘을 사용할 수 있습니다.[#Legal]
With just the donning of this helmet, you too may command the powers of the Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot.[#Legal]
只要戴上這個頭盔，你也能率領Scribble Shooter邪惡飛行員的團隊。[#Legal]
只要戴上這個頭盔，你也能率領Scribble Shooter邪惡飛行員的團隊。[#Legal]
With just the donning of this helmet, you too may command the powers of the Scribble Shooter Evil Pilot.[#Legal]
